# The "Hybrid Strategy" (Why you need both)

Smart businesses use **Apps for Discovery** (Marketing Expense) and **Pedilo for Retention** (Profit Optimization).
1. Client finds you on App -> First Order (High Cost).
2. You send flyer/QR with order -> "Order direct next time for benefits".
3. Client orders on Pedilo -> Second Order onwards (0% Cost).
4. **Result:** You lower your blended CAC and increase average margin.
